mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo , l.subject_approve_no subjectApproveNo , l.lecture_title lectureTitle , l.create_date createDate , sh.student_submitck studentSubmitCk , sa.professor_no , p.professor_name FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN student_homework sh ON l.lecture_no = sh.lecture_no INNER JOIN subject_approve sa ON l.subject_approve_no = sa.subject_approve_no INNER JOIN professor p ON sa.professor_no= p.professor_no WHERE l.subject_approve_no = #{subjectApproveNo}
